name: 200414-mongo-crud-lecture-house472
description: [Resource - MDN Mongo Info](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/Server-side/Express_Nodejs/mongoose#Connecting_to_MongoDB) | [Resource - Mongoose Methods](https://mongoosejs.com/docs/api/model.html) ### Set up - Create five endpoints in a routes module mounted to the `api` path     - Read all entries - display `Get all method worked`     - Read entry by title - display `Get by title method worked`     - Create an entry - display `Post method worked`     - Update an entry - display `Put method worked`     - Delete an entry - display `Delete method worked` - Create, test, and save all endpoints in Postman
